quizData.question:
Where do you eat your
cream egg?

options.option: 1. A man riding a horse. He’s eating a creme egg.
2. A woman holding a creme egg. She’s crying. Tears of joy.
You eat yours all in one go
You eat yours in two mouthfuls
You eat yours with a teaspoon
You scoop the goo out with your finger
You suck out the goo like an oyster
You eat yours in small nibbles
You eat yours melted on toast

options.option:
Give it to your friend.
You know how muc
they want it.
